description: Dashboard that graphs metrics exported via Prometheus plugin in Kong (http://github.com/kong/kong)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) per host - stacked
Total requests per second (RPS) per consumer

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{service=~"$service", route=~"$route", code =~"$code", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$range])) by (service, code)
sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{service=~"$service", route=~"$route", code =~"$code", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$range])) by (route, code)
sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{service=~"$service", route=~"$route", code =~"$code", code =~"2..|3..", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$range])) by (route, code)

panels.title: RPS per route and code - success 2xx and 3xx

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{service=~"$service", route=~"$route", code =~"$code", code =~"4..|5..", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", source="service"}[$range])) by (route, code, source)

panels.title: RPS per route and code - error 4xx and 5xx - from upstream service

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{service=~"$service", route=~"$route",  code =~"$code", code =~"4..|5..", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", source!="service"}[$range])) by (route, code, source)

panels.title: RPS per route and code - error 4xx and 5xx - from upstream kong

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", consumer=~"$consumer",code =~"$code",  namespace=~"$namespace", code =~"2..|3..", source="service"}[$range])) by (consumer, source, code)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) per consumer per code from Upstream service - SUCCESS 2xx and 3xx

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", consumer=~"$consumer",code =~"$code",  namespace=~"$namespace", code =~"4..|5..", source="service"}[$range])) by (consumer, source, code)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) per consumer per code from Upstream service - ERROR 4xx and 5xx

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", consumer=~"$consumer",code =~"$code", code =~"2..|3..", namespace=~"$namespace", source="service"}[$range])) by (consumer, route, source, code)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) per consumer/route per code from Upstream service - SUCCESS 2xx and 3xx

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", consumer=~"$consumer",code =~"$code", code =~"4..|5..", namespace=~"$namespace", source="service"}[$range])) by (consumer, route, source, code)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) per consumer/route per code from Upstream service - ERROR 4xx and 5xx

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", consumer=~"$consumer",code =~"$code",  namespace=~"$namespace", source!="service"}[$range])) by (consumer, source, code)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) per consumer per code from Kong

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", route=~"$route", consumer=~"$consumer",code =~"$code",  namespace=~"$namespace", source!="service"}[$range])) by (consumer, route, source, code)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) per consumer/route/code per code from Kong
Kong Proxy Latency across all services
Kong shared memory usage by Node ($instance)
Kong worker Lua VM usage by Node ($instance)
container rss and working set and usage

title: Nordea Kong (official)
